Posts.Content: Thank you so much, Pitt You may have read my post titled Meltdown, and your words have helped me a lot (as have those contributors on the meltdown topic). Tomorrow is my next chemo, and I am going to take your advice, let my body release its fears when it needs to, AND move forward every day. I had a big smile on my face when you mentioned the compliment from the 81 yr. old man. Probably has had some hard knocks along his path, and recognized true beauty when he saw it. With love from Santa Barbara, Sally
Posts.Title: Facing forward - exercising again!
